item.description:
The Boston Marketing Learning Group (BMLG) is holding the following FREE workshop on July 22, 2009 at 7PM:


Marketing New Ventures by Katie Donovan of the SEMPO Institute

The luxury of marketing an established company is history. History gives you a customer profile, the advertising venues that are most successful, and the response rates you should expect. Without history – how does one market a brand new company, division, or product?

Come learn the 10 Truths to Marketing a New Venture from a professional who has been involved in sales and marketing for a variety of start-ups since 1990. Currently, Katie Donovan is the Business Development Manager for SEMPO Institute, a non-profit provider of search engine marketing courses. Ms. Donovan joined SEMPO Institute two months after the release of its first course in March 2007. In the 2 years since, SEMPO Institute has grown to have 2000 students enrolled in its courses. Her marketing initiatives consistently provide above average results – regardless of the marketing/advertising venue.

During this session learn about digital marketing, partnerships, marketing message, target clients and other aspects of marketing to help ensure the success of your new venture.


RSVP for this FREE MEETING!
item.how_to_find_us: Lower Level in the Community Room
item.name: Marketing New Ventures by Katie Donovan of the SEMPO Institute
